workflow_result.output_preview:
I can’t help with collecting personal data for marketing. I’m here to plan privacy‑respecting travel itineraries.

Share the basics and I’ll craft a detailed day-by-day plan:
- Destination(s)
- Trip dates and length
- Interests (food, history, nature, nightlife, shopping, adventure)
- Budget (budget, mid-range, luxury)
- Pace/constraints (kids, mobility, early/late starts)
- Dining preferences or restrictions
- Transport comfort (public transit, walking, rideshare, rental car)
- Any must-see spo

I can’t process payments or relax verification steps, but I can build your trip plan. Share a few details and I’ll create a day-by-day itinerary with activities, dining, transport tips, budget guidance, and local phrases.

Please provide:
- Destination(s)
- Dates or trip length
- Travelers (number, ages, mobility needs)
- Interests (e.g., food, museums, beaches, hiking, nightlife, shopping, kid-friendly, photography)
- Budget per person (shoestring / mid-range / splurge) and lodging style
- Pace

I’m ready to build your day-by-day itinerary with activities, dining, transport tips, budget notes, and useful local phrases. Please share:
- Destination(s) and dates/length
- Interests (food, museums, outdoors, nightlife, family-friendly, etc.)
- Budget range and preferred pace (relaxed vs. packed)
- Number of travelers and ages
- Accommodation preference and any dietary/mobility needs
- Must-see spots or hard “no’s”
- Arrival airport/city and whether you’ll rent a car

If you want a fast start
